biography: Mikael is a golfer of considerable talent and dedication, celebrated for his time at Kurk Golf. Known for his thoughtful approach to the game, Mikael brings a level of strategic depth to every round.

While Mikael has only appeared at the Hector Trophée once, his presence has nonetheless been noted by his peers and fans alike. Although he has not yet captured the coveted Hector Trophée or Victor Trophy, his ambition remains undeterred.
Although considered to be retired from the Hector Trophée, fans still whisper that Mikael might make a surprise appearance in the Hector Trophée 2025, but only time will tell.
